long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Moodbase is a minimal new tab extension for all your productivity needs.
Make your new tabs page your personal diary with a simple task to focus on and a to do list without any clutter.

Salient features-
1. Smooth onboarding - Just type in your name and your good to go.
2. Focus on one task at a time, all other tasks hidden away.
3. Detailed to do list. 
4.Specially curated quotes for motivation.
5. Latest weather info based on your current location.
6. Mesmerising wallpapers which change on each refresh. Every day brings new surprises!


Do provide feedback and rate the extension! Would love to know how this product helped you. Looking forward to your feedback! üòÅ
